comment.author: 11572312@N00
comment._content: "The Philadelphia Athletics were founded in 1901 in the American League to compete with the Phillies. They played their last season in Philadelphia in 1954 before moving to Kansas City and eventually, in 1968 moving to Oakland." (Wikipedia): en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sports_in_Philadelphia
